message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I'm a bit flexible, but I'd like to get as close to the original price as possible.
I understand you're looking to get close to the original price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $11000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10250. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I'd like to get as close to the original price as possible.
I understand you're really close to the original price, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm offering the product to you for $10800.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit away from my target. I'm willing to meet you at $10500, but I'd prefer to go even lower. How about $10300?
I understand you're still looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm offering the product to you for $10600.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. I'm still looking to get as close to the original price as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $10400, but I'd prefer to go even lower. How about $10200?
I understand you're still looking to get close to the original price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm offering the product to you for $10400.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more adjustment, Alice. I'm still looking to get as close to the original price as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $10200, but I'd prefer to go even lower. How about $10000?
